description.example: Annual blood donation camp organized by Red Cross
Patient needs O+ blood urgently for surgery

phones.description: Array of phone numbers to resolve (max 50)

description.example: Review and approve the Q1 financial report
Daily sync with the engineering team

body.example: We will be performing scheduled maintenance tonight at 11 PM.
Please update your app to the latest version.

metadata.description: Optional metadata included in notification data payload

scheduledAt.description: ISO datetime with timezone offset (e.g. 2026-02-20T18:30:00+05:30 or UTC Z). If omitted, job is sent immediately.

timezone.description: IANA timezone name (for audit and UX)

clientRequestId.description: Client-side idempotency key to prevent duplicate submissions

scheduledAt.description: Future ISO datetime with timezone offset

onesignalPlayerId.description: OneSignal player ID for current browser/device

userAgent.description: Optional user-agent override for this device

url.description: URL to open when notification is clicked

warningMessage.example: Your business profile requires updates for compliance.

customAutoReplyMessage.example: Please expect delayed response while we are busy.
Currently in session, will reply shortly.

message.example: Reminder for your session tomorrow at 10 AM
